ValidationRule.description: Appointments can only be scheduled between 7:00 AM and 8:00 PM.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( Start_Time__c < TIMEVALUE("07:00:00.000"), Start_Time__c > TIMEVALUE("20:00:00.000"), AND( NOT(ISBLANK(End_Time__c)), End_Time__c > TIMEVALUE("20:00:00.000") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Appointments can only be scheduled between 7:00 AM and 8:00 PM.
